welcome_benefits: Complimentary Club Marriott, Swiggy One (3 months), MakeMyTrip Black Gold Tier, Amazon Prime & Times Prime Subscription on Spending ₹1,50,000 or More in the First 90 Days of Card Issuance

Rewards Rate: 5 Reward Points on every spend of Rs. 150. 10x Reward Points on SmartBuy and 2x Reward Points on weekend dining
Reward Redemption: Redeem Points for Flight/Hotel Bookings, Against Cash, or Convert Them to Airmiles
Domestic Lounge Access: Unlimited complimentary access to the domestic lounges
International Lounge Access: Unlimited complimentary access to the international lounges
Golf: 6 complimentary golf games per quarter at some of the most premium golf destinations around the world.
Insurance Benefits: Travel-related insurance benefits including an air accident cover worth Rs. 2 crores, emergency overseas hospitalization cover worth Rs. 50 Lakhs, and a credit liability cover worth up to Rs. 9 lakh.

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Waiver of renewal fee on spending Rs. 5,00,000 in the previous year.
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waived (max waiver capped at Rs. 1,000/month and min transaction of  Rs. 400 required).
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: Higher of 2.5% of the amount withdrawn or Rs. 500.

product_details: Complimentary annual membership of subscription platforms like Amazon Prime, Times Prime, etc, as a Welcome Benefit. These memberships are renewed at the expense of Rs. 8,00,000 in the anniversary year with the HDFC Bank Diners Club Black credit card.
Complimentary Ola Select, TataCliQ, BookMyShow, and cult.fit, vouchers on spends of over Rs. 80,000 every month.
5 Reward Points for every Rs. 150 spent (Reward Rate = 3.3%).
Low foreign currency markup fee of 2%.
Unlimited lounge access at 1,000 plus airport lounges in India and abroad.
Travel insurance benefits including an air accident cover worth Rs. 2 crore.
